articles.title: Sen. Blackburn slams Pelosi for 'unseemly' advice to US athletes at Beijing Olympics - Fox News
articles.description: Senator Marsha Blackburn called out Nancy Pelosi and the Biden administration for their hypocrisy in how they are treating the 2022 Beijing Olympics and allowing American media to broadcast the games while China is committing human rights violations.
